rules_text:
Haste, lifelink
[i]Retainer [/i]– Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Misfortunate[/i] – Whenever Arthur, Star Striking Hero attacks, roll a d20. If the result is below a 10, put a stun counter on Arthur. If the result is 16 or above, he gains double strike, trample, and indestructible until end of turn.
